call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Barnes (SAC) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Olynyk (DET) firms up in his screening position in Mitchell's (SAC) path and gives Mitchell a step of distance to avoid the contact, which Olynyk absorbs.
Mitchell (SAC) briefly has his arms around Joseph's (DET) upper half before correcting.
McGruder (DET) turns slightly as he braces for the impending contact with Mitchell (SAC), which McGruder absorbs during the pick.
Bey (DET) engages with Barnes (SAC) off-ball and marginal contact occurs to Barnes' right side as Bey slows his momentum to release away.

Diallo (DET) steps forward toward Fox (SAC) and marginal body contact occurs with Fox's left side after his gather. Olynyk (DET) jumps alongside Fox's path and absorbs the body contact that occurs as Fox jumps toward him during the driving shot attempt.
Holmes (SAC) jumps forward toward Joseph (DET) and delivers contact to Joseph's back during rebounding.
McGruder (DET) firms up in his screening position in Mitchell's (SAC) path and absorbs the contact as the defensive switch takes place.
Bey (DET) brings his left hand toward Barnes' (SAC) side and marginal contact occurs as Bey slows his momentum to release away.
Barnes (SAC) extends his right forearm into Bey's (DET) left side and delivers contact after Bey's gather.

After communicating with the Replay Center, the call on the floor of defensive goaltending was confirmed. Holmes (SAC) blocks the shot attempt after the ball hits the backboard above rim height and has a chance to score.
Diallo (DET) legally contests Fox's (SAC) jump shot attempt. Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Olynyk (DET) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently exiting.
Joseph (DET) brings his forearm toward Holmes' (SAC) back and marginal contact occurs as Holmes elevates for the rebound.

Due to a clock malfunction, the clock stops during Fox's drive and jump shot attempt at 44.7. The clock then restarts after the rebound by Olynyk (DET). This play was not noticed by the officials on the floor due to the imminent drive and shot attempt.
Olynyk (DET) switches his pivot foot after retrieving the rebound.
Bey (DET) and Barnes (SAC) engage and disengage with one another off-ball.
Olynyk (DET) maintains his left foot as his pivot after picking up his dribble on the wing.
Joseph (DET) and Mitchell (SAC) come together at the same spot during the drive and Joseph's off-arm naturally releases forward toward Mitchell as they each absorb the marginal contact.
Stewart (DET) engages and disengages with Holmes (SAC) as Holmes moves along the perimeter.
Stewart (DET) legally contests Davis' (SAC) jump shot attempt. Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Diallo (DET) and Bey (DET) brush Mitchell's (SAC) left and right arm, respectively, and marginal contact occurs as they each attempt to retrieve the loose ball.
Diallo's (DET) left foot is out of bounds as he makes contact with the ball.
Diallo (DET) makes marginal contact with Mitchell (SAC) as he pursues the loose ball during the rebound.
Bey (DET) and Mitchell (SAC) each make contact with the ball and tie one another up as they dive for the loose ball. A jump ball is assessed.
Barnes (SAC) moves forward toward McGruder (DET) and marginal contact occurs to McGruder's front as he returns to the floor.
Fox (SAC) moves forward toward McGruder (DET) and marginal body contact occurs as McGruder is passing.
Holmes (SAC) makes clean contact with the ball and deflects it away from Stewart (DET).
McGruder (DET) is in the lane for less than three seconds when Fox's (SAC) shot is imminent.
Stewart (DET) avoids making contact with Fox's (SAC) left elbow during his upward shooting motion and legally contests the jump shot attempt.
